Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe xšnaōϑra ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌ōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e xšnaōϑra ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi tauua ātarš puϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ xšnaōϑra ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca.

"āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe xšnaōϑra he has to give a piece of ēsm and bōy to the fire yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌ōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e xšnaōϑra he has to give a piece of ēsm and bōy to the fire yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi tauua ātarš puϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ xšnaōϑra he has to give a piece of ēsm and bōy to the fire; yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca."
